name: Phelios
overview: Find the Sword PHELIOS The gods are at war! Apollo, the sun deity, must move heaven, earth and the underworld to rescue Artemis, goddess of the moon. She's been taken by Typhon, ruler of the darkness. Galloping on Pegaus, his winged horse, Apollo slashes his way towards Artemis with the sword of light. Battle through 7 levels of monster-infested worlds. Grab extra powers from god's messenger to aid your quest. Then face your nemesis, terrible, taunting Typhon, to rescue Artemis - or perish!
